query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.

query.result: 19 Agh, cairys Jee! Cre'n oirr shen ta kiangley magh 20 noa chengey as pianyn, myr hooar mee? 21 As cre'n fa dy vel nyn loght cur lhiggey dooin?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.
22 Come fa l’onda là sovra Cariddi, 23 che si frange con quella in cui s’intoppa, 24 così convien che qui la gente riddi.
query.result: 22 Myr ta'n tonn jannoo harrish Cariddi, 23 brishey noi'n tonn elley ta çheet noi, 24 myr shen ta feme dy vel y sleih çheeraghey anish.

query.prompt:

Please translate each line literally into Manx.
